title: List of all Androidunity   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidunity   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: Android_Screen_Recorder_Plugin
repoList.description: A simple android library project for record android screen in Unity

repoList.name: AndroidOnAudioFocusChangeListenerForUnity
repoList.description: Android plugin library that informs unity about audio focus changes. It also has a reliable way of telling if other applications are currently playing music within unity.

repoList.name: unity3DPocketSphinx-android-lib
repoList.description: This is a library that uses CMU Sphinx speech recognition engine, that is used in Unity3D.

repoList.name: ANdroid-Push-Unity-Library
repoList.description: Android Library Project for PushNotification with Unity

repoList.name: Facebook-Unity-library
repoList.description: App42 Face book unity library to authorize facebook in Android applicatioin

repoList.name: UASDKInter
repoList.description: Unity使用Plugins方式接入Android 渠道SDK的通用框架，使用中间件jar包的形式调用各种渠道SDK，包括Library。

repoList.name: UnityNativeImagePicker
repoList.description: Unity plugin for getting Images from Camera roll on Android or Photo Library on iOS or taking photos with the camera.

repoList.name: UnityGoogleDriveAndroid
repoList.description: Used to build AppAuth-Android client library for UnityGoogleDrive project

repoList.name: UnityAndroidToasty
repoList.description: Sample to solve Android dependent library by gradle.

repoList.name: AndroidLibrary
repoList.description: the android library to support unity app
